segments.text: Good morning . Could I speak to Frans Smith please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Frans Smith ? I think you may have the wrong number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is . But there is no Frans Smith here . Do you know which department he works in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The accounts department , no problem . I'm just putting you through now .
segments.speaker: S2
